original_text:
Binding his foal to the vine
    and his donkey's colt to the choice vine,
he has washed his garments in wine
    and his vesture in the blood of grapes.
korean_text: 그의 나귀를 포도나무에 매며 그의 암나귀 새끼를 아름다운 포도나무에 맬 것이며 또 그 옷을 포도주에 빨며 그의 복장을 포도즙에 빨리로다

sentences.original_text: Binding his foal to the vine
and his donkey's colt to the choice vine
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 나귀 새끼를 아름다운 포도나무에 매며

sentences.original_text: he has washed his garments in wine
and his vesture in the blood of grapes
